nfs_stats_thread.c

Go to the documentation of this file.

00086 #ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H

00095 #include <stdio.h>
00096 #include <string.h>
00097 #include <pthread.h>
00098 #include <sys/stat.h>
00099 #include <time.h>
00100 #include "nfs_core.h" 
00101 #include "nfs_stat.h"
00102 #include "nfs_exports.h"
00103 
00104 extern nfs_parameter_t      nfs_param ;
00105 extern time_t               ServerBootTime ;
00106 extern hash_table_t       * ht_ip_stats[NB_MAX_WORKER_THREAD] ;
00107 
00108 void * stats_thread( void * addr )
00109 {
00110   int                  rc ;
00111   FILE               * stats_file ;
00112   struct stat          statref ;
00113   struct stat          stattest ;
00114   time_t               current_time ;
00115   struct tm            current_time_struct ;
00116   struct tm            boot_time_struct ;
00117   char                 strdate[1024] ;
00118   char                 strbootdate[1024] ;
00119   unsigned int         i ;
00120   unsigned int         j ;
00121   int                  reopen_stats = FALSE ;
00122   nfs_worker_data_t  * workers_data = addr ;
00123   
00124   cache_inode_stat_t   global_cache_inode_stat ;
00125   nfs_worker_stat_t    global_worker_stat ;
00126   hash_stat_t          hstat   ;
00127   hash_stat_t          hstat_reverse ;
00128   
00129   unsigned long long   total_fsal_calls;
00130   fsal_statistics_t    global_fsal_stat;
00131  
00132   unsigned int          min_pending_request ;
00133   unsigned int          max_pending_request ; 
00134   unsigned int          total_pending_request ;
00135   unsigned int          average_pending_request ;
00136   unsigned int          len_pending_request = 0 ; 
00137  
00138 #ifndef _NO_BUDDY_SYSTEM
00139   buddy_stats_t        global_buddy_stat;
00140 #endif  
00141 
00142   SetNameFunction( "stat_thr" ) ;
00143 
00144   
00145 #ifndef _NO_BUDDY_SYSTEM
00146   if ( ( rc = BuddyInit( NULL )) != BUDDY_SUCCESS )
00147     {
00148       /* Failed init */
00149       DisplayLog( "NFS STATS : Memory manager could not be initialized, exiting..." ) ;
00150       exit( 1 ) ;
00151     }
00152   DisplayLog( "NFS STATS : Memory manager successfully initialized" ) ;
00153 #endif
00154 
00155   /* Open the stats file, in append mode */
00156   if( ( stats_file = fopen( nfs_param.core_param.stats_file_path, "a" ) ) == NULL )
00157     {
00158       DisplayLog( "NFS STATS : Could not open stats file %s, no stats will be made...", 
00159                   nfs_param.core_param.stats_file_path ) ;
00160       return NULL ;
00161     }
00162 
00163   if( stat( nfs_param.core_param.stats_file_path, &statref ) != 0 )
00164     {
00165       DisplayLog( "NFS STATS : Could not get inode for %s, no stats will be made...", 
00166                   nfs_param.core_param.stats_file_path ) ;
00167       return NULL ;
00168     }
00169   
00170 #ifdef _SNMP_ADM_ACTIVE
00171   /* start snmp library */
00172   if( stats_snmp(workers_data) == 0 )
00173      DisplayLog( "NFS STATS: SNMP stats service was started successfully" ) ;
00174   else
00175      DisplayLog( "NFS STATS: ERROR starting SNMP stats export thread" ) ;
00176 #endif /*_SNMP_ADM_ACTIVE*/
00177   
00178   while( 1 )
00179     {
00180        /* Initial wait */
00181       sleep( nfs_param.core_param.stats_update_delay ) ;
00182 
00183       /* Debug trace */
00184       DisplayLogLevel( NIV_EVENT, "NFS STATS : now dumping stats" ) ;
00185 
00186       /* Stats main loop */
00187       if( stat( nfs_param.core_param.stats_file_path, &stattest ) == 0 )
00188         {
00189            if( stattest.st_ino != statref.st_ino )
00190              reopen_stats = TRUE ;
00191         }
00192       else
00193         {
00194           if( errno == ENOENT )
00195             reopen_stats = TRUE ;
00196         }
00197       
00198       /* Check is file has changed (the inode number will be different) */
00199       if( reopen_stats == TRUE )
00200         {
00201           /* Stats file has changed */
00202           DisplayLog( "NFS STATS : stats file has changed or was removed, I close and reopen it" ) ;
00203           fflush( stats_file ) ;
00204           fclose( stats_file ) ;
00205           if( ( stats_file = fopen( nfs_param.core_param.stats_file_path, "a" ) ) == NULL )
00206             {
00207               DisplayLog( "NFS STATS : Could not open stats file %s, no further stats will be made...", 
00208                           nfs_param.core_param.stats_file_path ) ;
00209               return NULL ;
00210             }
00211           statref = stattest ;
00212           reopen_stats = FALSE ;
00213         }
00214           
00215       /* Get the current epoch time */
00216       current_time = time( NULL ) ;
00217       memcpy( &current_time_struct, localtime( &current_time ), sizeof( current_time_struct ) ) ;
00218       snprintf( strdate, 1024, "%u, %.2d/%.2d/%.4d %.2d:%.2d:%.2d ",
00219                 (unsigned int)current_time,
00220                 current_time_struct.tm_mday, 
00221                 current_time_struct.tm_mon+1, 
00222                 1900 + current_time_struct.tm_year, 
00223                 current_time_struct.tm_hour, 
00224                 current_time_struct.tm_min, 
00225                 current_time_struct.tm_sec ) ;
00226 
00227       /* Printing the general Stats */
00228       memcpy( &boot_time_struct, localtime( &ServerBootTime ), sizeof( boot_time_struct ) ) ;
00229       snprintf( strbootdate, 1024, "%u, %.2d/%.2d/%.4d %.2d:%.2d:%.2d ",
00230                 (unsigned int)ServerBootTime,
00231                 boot_time_struct.tm_mday,
00232                 boot_time_struct.tm_mon+1,
00233                 1900 + boot_time_struct.tm_year,
00234                 boot_time_struct.tm_hour,
00235                 boot_time_struct.tm_min,
00236                 boot_time_struct.tm_sec ) ;
00237 
00238       fprintf( stats_file, "NFS_SERVER_GENERAL,%s;%s\n",
00239                strdate,
00240                strbootdate ) ;
00241 
00242       /* Zeroing the cache_stats */
00243       global_cache_inode_stat.nb_gc_lru_active = 0 ;
00244       global_cache_inode_stat.nb_gc_lru_total  = 0 ;
00245       global_cache_inode_stat.nb_call_total  = 0 ;
00246 
00247       memset( global_cache_inode_stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover, 0, sizeof( unsigned int ) * CACHE_INODE_NB_COMMAND ) ;
00248 
00249       /* Merging the cache inode stats for every thread */
00250       for( i = 0 ; i < nfs_param.core_param.nb_worker ; i++ )
00251         {
00252           global_cache_inode_stat.nb_gc_lru_active += workers_data[i].cache_inode_client.stat.nb_gc_lru_active ;
00253           global_cache_inode_stat.nb_gc_lru_total  += workers_data[i].cache_inode_client.stat.nb_gc_lru_total ;
00254           global_cache_inode_stat.nb_call_total    += workers_data[i].cache_inode_client.stat.nb_call_total ;
00255           
00256           for( j = 0 ; j < CACHE_INODE_NB_COMMAND ; j++ )
00257             {
00258               if( i == 0 )
00259                 {
00260                   global_cache_inode_stat.func_stats.nb_success[j]       = workers_data[i].cache_inode_client.stat.func_stats.nb_success[j] ;
00261                   global_cache_inode_stat.func_stats.nb_call[j]          = workers_data[i].cache_inode_client.stat.func_stats.nb_call[j] ;
00262                   global_cache_inode_stat.func_stats.nb_err_retryable[j] = workers_data[i].cache_inode_client.stat.func_stats.nb_err_retryable[j] ;
00263                   global_cache_inode_stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[j] = workers_data[i].cache_inode_client.stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[j] ;
00264                 }
00265               else
00266                 {
00267                   global_cache_inode_stat.func_stats.nb_success[j]       += workers_data[i].cache_inode_client.stat.func_stats.nb_success[j] ;
00268                   global_cache_inode_stat.func_stats.nb_call[j]          += workers_data[i].cache_inode_client.stat.func_stats.nb_call[j] ;
00269                   global_cache_inode_stat.func_stats.nb_err_retryable[j] += workers_data[i].cache_inode_client.stat.func_stats.nb_err_retryable[j] ;
00270                   global_cache_inode_stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[j] += workers_data[i].cache_inode_client.stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[j] ;
00271                 }
00272               
00273             }
00274         }
00275       
00276       /* Printing the cache_inode stat */
00277       fprintf( stats_file, "CACHE_INODE_CALLS,%s;%u,%u,%u", 
00278                strdate,
00279                global_cache_inode_stat.nb_call_total, 
00280                global_cache_inode_stat.nb_gc_lru_total,
00281                global_cache_inode_stat.nb_gc_lru_active ) ;
00282 
00283       for( j = 0 ; j < CACHE_INODE_NB_COMMAND ; j++ )
00284         fprintf( stats_file, "|%u,%u,%u,%u", 
00285                  global_cache_inode_stat.func_stats.nb_call[j], 
00286                  global_cache_inode_stat.func_stats.nb_success[j],
00287                  global_cache_inode_stat.func_stats.nb_err_retryable[j],
00288                  global_cache_inode_stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[j] ) ;
00289       fprintf( stats_file, "\n" ) ;
00290 
00291       /* Pinting the cache inode hash stat */
00292       /* This is done only on worker[0]: the hashtable is shared and worker 0 always exists */
00293       HashTable_GetStats( workers_data[0].ht, &hstat ) ;
00294      
00295       fprintf( stats_file, "CACHE_INODE_HASH,%s;%u,%u,%u,%u|%u,%u,%u|%u,%u,%u|%u,%u,%u|%u,%u,%u\n",
00296                strdate,
00297                hstat.dynamic.nb_entries, 
00298                hstat.computed.min_rbt_num_node,
00299                hstat.computed.max_rbt_num_node,
00300                hstat.computed.average_rbt_num_node,
00301                hstat.dynamic.ok.nb_set,
00302                hstat.dynamic.notfound.nb_set,
00303                hstat.dynamic.err.nb_set,
00304                hstat.dynamic.ok.nb_test,
00305                hstat.dynamic.notfound.nb_test,
00306                hstat.dynamic.err.nb_test,
00307                hstat.dynamic.ok.nb_get,
00308                hstat.dynamic.notfound.nb_get,
00309                hstat.dynamic.err.nb_get,
00310                hstat.dynamic.ok.nb_del,
00311                hstat.dynamic.notfound.nb_del,
00312                hstat.dynamic.err.nb_del );
00313 
00314       /* Merging the NFS protocols stats together */
00315       global_worker_stat.nb_total_req         = 0 ;
00316       global_worker_stat.nb_udp_req           = 0 ;
00317       global_worker_stat.nb_tcp_req           = 0 ;
00318       global_worker_stat.stat_req.nb_mnt1_req = 0 ;
00319       global_worker_stat.stat_req.nb_mnt3_req = 0 ;
00320       global_worker_stat.stat_req.nb_nfs2_req = 0 ;
00321       global_worker_stat.stat_req.nb_nfs3_req = 0 ;
00322       global_worker_stat.stat_req.nb_nfs4_req = 0 ;
00323 
00324       /* prepare for computing pending request stats */
00325       min_pending_request     = 10000000 ;
00326       max_pending_request     = 0 ;
00327       total_pending_request   = 0 ;
00328       average_pending_request = 0 ;
00329       len_pending_request     = 0 ;
00330 
00331       for( i = 0 ; i < nfs_param.core_param.nb_worker ; i++ )
00332         {
00333           global_worker_stat.nb_total_req         += workers_data[i].stats.nb_total_req ;
00334           global_worker_stat.nb_udp_req           += workers_data[i].stats.nb_udp_req ;
00335           global_worker_stat.nb_tcp_req           += workers_data[i].stats.nb_tcp_req ;
00336           global_worker_stat.stat_req.nb_mnt1_req += workers_data[i].stats.stat_req.nb_mnt1_req ;
00337           global_worker_stat.stat_req.nb_mnt3_req += workers_data[i].stats.stat_req.nb_mnt3_req ;
00338           global_worker_stat.stat_req.nb_nfs2_req += workers_data[i].stats.stat_req.nb_nfs2_req ;
00339           global_worker_stat.stat_req.nb_nfs3_req += workers_data[i].stats.stat_req.nb_nfs3_req ;
00340           global_worker_stat.stat_req.nb_nfs4_req += workers_data[i].stats.stat_req.nb_nfs4_req ;
00341 
00342           for( j = 0 ; j < MNT_V1_NB_COMMAND ; j++ )
00343             {
00344               if( i == 0 )
00345                 {
00346                   global_worker_stat.stat_req.stat_req_mnt1[j].total   = workers_data[i].stats.stat_req.stat_req_mnt1[j].total ;
00347                   global_worker_stat.stat_req.stat_req_mnt1[j].success = workers_data[i].stats.stat_req.stat_req_mnt1[j].success ;
00348                   global_worker_stat.stat_req.stat_req_mnt1[j].dropped = workers_data[i].stats.stat_req.stat_req_mnt1[j].dropped ;
00349                 }
00350               else
00351                 {
00352                   global_worker_stat.stat_req.stat_req_mnt1[j].total   += workers_data[i].stats.stat_req.stat_req_mnt1[j].total ;
00353                   global_worker_stat.stat_req.stat_req_mnt1[j].success += workers_data[i].stats.stat_req.stat_req_mnt1[j].success ;
00354                   global_worker_stat.stat_req.stat_req_mnt1[j].dropped += workers_data[i].stats.stat_req.stat_req_mnt1[j].dropped ;
00355                 }
00356             }
00357          
00358           for( j = 0 ; j < MNT_V3_NB_COMMAND ; j++ )
00359             {
00360                if( i == 0 )
00361                 {
00362                   global_worker_stat.stat_req.stat_req_mnt3[j].total   = workers_data[i].stats.stat_req.stat_req_mnt3[j].total ;
00363                   global_worker_stat.stat_req.stat_req_mnt3[j].success = workers_data[i].stats.stat_req.stat_req_mnt3[j].success ;
00364                   global_worker_stat.stat_req.stat_req_mnt3[j].dropped = workers_data[i].stats.stat_req.stat_req_mnt3[j].dropped ;
00365                 }
00366                else
00367                  {
00368                    global_worker_stat.stat_req.stat_req_mnt3[j].total   += workers_data[i].stats.stat_req.stat_req_mnt3[j].total ;
00369                    global_worker_stat.stat_req.stat_req_mnt3[j].success += workers_data[i].stats.stat_req.stat_req_mnt3[j].success ;
00370                    global_worker_stat.stat_req.stat_req_mnt3[j].dropped += workers_data[i].stats.stat_req.stat_req_mnt3[j].dropped ;
00371                  }  
00372             }
00373           
00374           for( j = 0 ; j < NFS_V2_NB_COMMAND ; j++ )
00375             {
00376                if( i == 0 )
00377                 {
00378                   global_worker_stat.stat_req.stat_req_nfs2[j].total   = workers_data[i].stats.stat_req.stat_req_nfs2[j].total ;
00379                   global_worker_stat.stat_req.stat_req_nfs2[j].success = workers_data[i].stats.stat_req.stat_req_nfs2[j].success ;
00380                   global_worker_stat.stat_req.stat_req_nfs2[j].dropped = workers_data[i].stats.stat_req.stat_req_nfs2[j].dropped ;
00381                 }
00382                else
00383                  {
00384                    global_worker_stat.stat_req.stat_req_nfs2[j].total   += workers_data[i].stats.stat_req.stat_req_nfs2[j].total ;
00385                    global_worker_stat.stat_req.stat_req_nfs2[j].success += workers_data[i].stats.stat_req.stat_req_nfs2[j].success ;
00386                    global_worker_stat.stat_req.stat_req_nfs2[j].dropped += workers_data[i].stats.stat_req.stat_req_nfs2[j].dropped ;
00387                  }
00388             }
00389           
00390 
00391           for( j = 0 ; j < NFS_V3_NB_COMMAND ; j++ )
00392             { 
00393               if( i == 0 )
00394                 {
00395                   global_worker_stat.stat_req.stat_req_nfs3[j].total   = workers_data[i].stats.stat_req.stat_req_nfs3[j].total ;
00396                   global_worker_stat.stat_req.stat_req_nfs3[j].success = workers_data[i].stats.stat_req.stat_req_nfs3[j].success ;
00397                   global_worker_stat.stat_req.stat_req_nfs3[j].dropped = workers_data[i].stats.stat_req.stat_req_nfs3[j].dropped ;
00398                 }
00399               else
00400                 {
00401                   global_worker_stat.stat_req.stat_req_nfs3[j].total   += workers_data[i].stats.stat_req.stat_req_nfs3[j].total ;
00402                   global_worker_stat.stat_req.stat_req_nfs3[j].success += workers_data[i].stats.stat_req.stat_req_nfs3[j].success ;
00403                   global_worker_stat.stat_req.stat_req_nfs3[j].dropped += workers_data[i].stats.stat_req.stat_req_nfs3[j].dropped ;
00404                 }
00405             }
00406           
00407           for( j = 0 ; j < NFS_V4_NB_COMMAND ; j++ )
00408             {
00409               if( i == 0 )
00410                 {
00411                   global_worker_stat.stat_req.stat_req_nfs4[j].total   = workers_data[i].stats.stat_req.stat_req_nfs4[j].total ;
00412                   global_worker_stat.stat_req.stat_req_nfs4[j].success = workers_data[i].stats.stat_req.stat_req_nfs4[j].success ;
00413                   global_worker_stat.stat_req.stat_req_nfs4[j].dropped = workers_data[i].stats.stat_req.stat_req_nfs4[j].dropped ;
00414                 }
00415               else
00416                 {
00417                   global_worker_stat.stat_req.stat_req_nfs4[j].total   += workers_data[i].stats.stat_req.stat_req_nfs4[j].total ;
00418                   global_worker_stat.stat_req.stat_req_nfs4[j].success += workers_data[i].stats.stat_req.stat_req_nfs4[j].success ;
00419                   global_worker_stat.stat_req.stat_req_nfs4[j].dropped += workers_data[i].stats.stat_req.stat_req_nfs4[j].dropped ;
00420                 }
00421             }
00422          
00423            /* Computing the pending request stats */
00424           len_pending_request = workers_data[i].pending_request->nb_entry - workers_data[i].pending_request->nb_invalid ;
00425 
00426           if( len_pending_request < min_pending_request ) 
00427                 min_pending_request = len_pending_request ;
00428  
00429           if( len_pending_request > max_pending_request ) 
00430                 max_pending_request = len_pending_request ;
00431 
00432           total_pending_request += len_pending_request ;
00433         } /* for( i = 0 ; i < nfs_param.core_param.nb_worker ; i++ ) */
00434 
00435       /* Compute average pending request */
00436       average_pending_request = total_pending_request / nfs_param.core_param.nb_worker ;
00437 
00438       fprintf( stats_file, "NFS/MOUNT STATISTICS,%s;%u,%u,%u|%u,%u,%u,%u,%u|%u,%u,%u,%u\n", 
00439                strdate, 
00440                global_worker_stat.nb_total_req,
00441                global_worker_stat.nb_udp_req,
00442                global_worker_stat.nb_tcp_req,
00443                global_worker_stat.stat_req.nb_mnt1_req,
00444                global_worker_stat.stat_req.nb_mnt3_req,
00445                global_worker_stat.stat_req.nb_nfs2_req,
00446                global_worker_stat.stat_req.nb_nfs3_req,
00447                global_worker_stat.stat_req.nb_nfs4_req,
00448                total_pending_request,   
00449                min_pending_request, 
00450                max_pending_request,

00616       memset( &global_fsal_stat, 0, sizeof( fsal_statistics_t ));
00617       total_fsal_calls = 0;
00618       
00619       for( i = 0 ; i < nfs_param.core_param.nb_worker ; i++ )
00620         {
00621           
00622           for( j = 0 ; j < FSAL_NB_FUNC ; j++ )
00623             {
00624               total_fsal_calls += workers_data[i].stats.fsal_stats.func_stats.nb_call[j];
00625               
00626               global_fsal_stat.func_stats.nb_call[j] += workers_data[i].stats.fsal_stats.func_stats.nb_call[j];
00627               global_fsal_stat.func_stats.nb_success[j] += workers_data[i].stats.fsal_stats.func_stats.nb_success[j];
00628               global_fsal_stat.func_stats.nb_err_retryable[j] += workers_data[i].stats.fsal_stats.func_stats.nb_err_retryable[j];
00629               global_fsal_stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[j] += workers_data[i].stats.fsal_stats.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[j];
00630             }
00631             
00632         }
00633       
00634       
00635       fprintf( stats_file, "FSAL_CALLS,%s;%llu", strdate, total_fsal_calls ) ;
00636       for( j = 0 ; j < FSAL_NB_FUNC ; j++ )
00637         fprintf( stats_file, "|%u,%u,%u,%u", 
00638                  global_fsal_stat.func_stats.nb_call[j],
00639                  global_fsal_stat.func_stats.nb_success[j],
00640                  global_fsal_stat.func_stats.nb_err_retryable[j],
00641                  global_fsal_stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[j] ) ;
00642       fprintf( stats_file, "\n" ) ;
00643       
00644 
00645 
00646 #ifndef _NO_BUDDY_SYSTEM
00647     
00648       /* buddy memory */
00649       
00650       memset( &global_buddy_stat, 0, sizeof( buddy_stats_t ));
00651       
00652       for( i = 0 ; i < nfs_param.core_param.nb_worker ; i++ )
00653         {
00654           
00655           global_buddy_stat.TotalMemSpace += workers_data[i].stats.buddy_stats.TotalMemSpace ;          
00656           global_buddy_stat.ExtraMemSpace += workers_data[i].stats.buddy_stats.ExtraMemSpace ;          
00657           
00658           global_buddy_stat.StdMemSpace += workers_data[i].stats.buddy_stats.StdMemSpace ;          
00659           global_buddy_stat.StdUsedSpace += workers_data[i].stats.buddy_stats.StdUsedSpace ;
00660           
00661           if ( workers_data[i].stats.buddy_stats.StdUsedSpace > global_buddy_stat.WM_StdUsedSpace )
00662             global_buddy_stat.WM_StdUsedSpace = workers_data[i].stats.buddy_stats.StdUsedSpace;
00663           
00664           global_buddy_stat.NbStdPages += workers_data[i].stats.buddy_stats.NbStdPages ;
00665           global_buddy_stat.NbStdUsed += workers_data[i].stats.buddy_stats.NbStdUsed ;
00666           
00667           if ( workers_data[i].stats.buddy_stats.NbStdUsed > global_buddy_stat.WM_NbStdUsed )
00668             global_buddy_stat.WM_NbStdUsed = workers_data[i].stats.buddy_stats.NbStdUsed;
00669           
00670         }
00671       
00672         /* total memory space preallocated, total space preallocated for pages, total space that overflows pages */
00673         /* total memory, used memory, avg used memory/worker, max used memory/worker */
00674         /* total pages, used pages, avg used pages/worker, max used pages/worker */
00675         
00676        fprintf( stats_file, "BUDDY_MEMORY,%s;%lu,%lu,%lu|%lu,%lu,%lu|%u,%u,%u,%u\n",
00677                 strdate,
00678                 (unsigned long)global_buddy_stat.TotalMemSpace,
00679                 (unsigned long)global_buddy_stat.StdMemSpace,
00680                 (unsigned long)global_buddy_stat.ExtraMemSpace,
00681            
00682                 (unsigned long)global_buddy_stat.StdUsedSpace,
00683                 (unsigned long)(global_buddy_stat.StdUsedSpace / nfs_param.core_param.nb_worker),
00684                 (unsigned long)global_buddy_stat.WM_StdUsedSpace,
00685            
00686                 global_buddy_stat.NbStdPages,
00687                 global_buddy_stat.NbStdUsed,
00688                 global_buddy_stat.NbStdUsed / nfs_param.core_param.nb_worker,
00689                 global_buddy_stat.WM_NbStdUsed
00690                  );
00691                 
00692 
00693 #endif
00694 
00695       /* Flush the data written */
00696       fprintf( stats_file, "END, ----- NO MORE STATS FOR THIS PASS ----\n" ) ;
00697       fflush( stats_file ) ;
00698 
00699       /* Now managed IP stats dump */
00700       nfs_ip_stats_dump(  ht_ip_stats, 
00701                           nfs_param.core_param.nb_worker, 
00702                           nfs_param.core_param.stats_per_client_directory  ) ;
